Constructor Detail

Mystery

public Mystery()
Creates a new Mystery object, simulating a murder mystery. This sets up a list of suspects, has the crime get committed, then finds and reveals the criminal.

Method Detail

commitCrime

public void commitCrime()
A crime occurs! This method chooses the murder and the victim. It tracks the weapon used, and reports the crime.

findMurderer

public Suspect findMurderer()
Figure out who committed the crime! This finds a suspect who had the murder weapon, and returns that suspect.

Returns:
The suspect who committed the crime.
